item.title: (WIP) Character encodings
item.description: ASCII I started attending an online class called the Bradfield Computer Science Intensive. I can tell you that I am learning a lot of new and exciting stuff. Stuff I should have learned in college, but didn’t. I might write a post about that someday. But for now Ill try and get straight to the point. Computers only speak one language. Its binary. The only 2 alphabets are [0, 1]. You can also think of them as [On, Off], [Up, Down].
